segments.text: This whole kitchen is a ticking time bomb, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just gushing water everywhere, a steady stream over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's completely unacceptable to leave a faucet running like that, especially when the drain isn't working.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of anger at the carelessness displayed here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor woman is going to have a massive flood to deal with.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children! They are putting themselves in such danger on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely fearful that the boy will fall and seriously injure himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the noise, the broken dishes, the absolute chaos thatâ€™s about to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene immediately before things get out of hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to these glaring hazards?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of awareness here is truly astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR
